text: Nkͻmhyεni, ka sε­: “Menfri Nyankopͻn akyi nhwehwε otemmufoͻ foforͻ, aberε a Ɔno na W’asiane Nwoma no ama mo a εkyerεkyerε nsεm mu pefee no?’’ Wͻn a Yε’maa wͻn Nwoma no (Yudafoͻ ne Kristofoͻ no) nim yie sε ampa sε εyε Adiyisεm a efri wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ a εyε nokorε. Enti monhwε na moankͻka wͻn a wͻn adwen nnsi wͻn pie no ho
